entry.title: Pedro Pascal responding to transphobia on social media: “I can’t think of...
entry.content: Pedro Pascal responding to transphobia on social media: “I can’t think of anything more vile and small and pathetic than terrorizing the smallest, most vulnerable community of people who want nothing from you, except the right to exist.”
